name: Time Lord (itch) (Beta)
description:
This is "Time Lord", my entry for the jam made in one day with Unity.

I HAVE A SHADER BUG IN THE WEBGL BUILD, CONSIDER TRYING THE WEB VERSION INSTEAD FOR BETTER EXPERIENCE!

(ALSO BE CAREFUL THE GAME CAN CONTAINS FLASHY COLORS AND FAST TRANSITIONS)

You are a Time Lord, not the professional kind but hey, nobody's perfect!

CONTROLS

Keys A, D/Arrow Keys : Move Left/Right

Space Key : Jump (You can spam it!)

R : Reset The Game (In case you are stuck!)

Time to become the ultimate time master!

HOW I MADE THE GAME
